sense.def:
Paste
je mehka, pogosto lepljiva mešanica trde snovi in tekočine; zlahka jo namažemo.

seg.quote: Mix together the flour and the water to form a paste.

sense.def:
Kadar človek
pastes something on a surface
, nekaj z lepilom pritrdi na neko površino.

seg.quote: The children were busy pasting gold stars on a chart.
